Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to exempting certain statements relating to sexual abuse or misconduct from disclosure under FOIL
Summary: Exempts statements of victims and witnesses relating to sexual abuse or misconduct from disclosure under FOIL provisions.
LawCode: Amd ยง87, Pub Off L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public officers law, in relation to exempting certain statements relating to sexual abuse or misconduct from disclosure
